title: Joint Chair in International Economic Law
field: Commercial Law, European Law, Financial Law, International Law,
job_description: Department of LawRobert Schuman Centre for Advanced StudiesThe European University Institute is looking for candidates with a distinguished record of scholarly publications and experience in postgraduate teaching and doctoral supervision, to fill aJoint Chair in International Economic LawThe chair is a fulltime joint appointment between the Department of Law and the Robert Schuman Centre for Advanced Studies. Candidates are sought in the field of international trade (WTO) law or investment law. Candidates should be prepared to supervise doctoral researchers across a wide range of themes of European and international economic law. They should also be prepared to contribute to the research activities of the Global Governance Programme at the Robert Schuman Centre.
